name: Matter Switch
description:
Matter Switch 

A platform-puzzle game, where to solve puzzles and advance, a tool is provided that is able to exchange objects between them.
Teleports heavy objects to activate dangerous mechanisms or enemies to eliminate them, striven to find new ways to solve a puzzle faster.

This short version was made for the 2018 Game Maker Italy annual jam and contains 17 game levels and a timer to keep the completion time.

You will find yourself in an unknown spaceship that wanders in space, and follow the instructions of a mysterious man who claims to know how to get out of there, will you be skilled enough to get out alive?

- the game is in italian
